tasks.label: ROS2: Debug Build
tasks.command:
echo -e '
Use the following command to run under gdbserver:
 ros2 run --prefix "gdbserver localhost:3000" <package_name> <executable_name>

Update .vscode/launch.json accordingly.
' && source /opt/ros/<ros_distro>/setup.bash && colcon build --symlink-install --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo

tasks.label: ROS2: Clean Build
tasks.command: rm -rf build/ install/ log/ && source /opt/ros/<ros_distro>/setup.bash && colcon build --symlink-install
